p: However, when comparing our study to other studies, even those done with LANDIS‐II in the same region, we found widely varying assumptions and inputs and it is unknown what effect these had on the results. Without sensitivity analyses to evaluate the effect of different inputs, it is difficult to compare across studies leaving systematic review or meta‐analyses difficult (see James et al. 2018). Future research would benefit from more transparency in model assumptions and limitations and in reporting a common set of metrics for all studies.
